1.title: Dancing Rabbit Ecovillage
1.plot: Dancing Rabbit Ecovillage is a living experiment to uncover how to live more sustainably. Hear from members about what it is like to live in an intentional community together, in this first episode of the Planet Community series.

2.title: Student Housing Co-ops and the Inter-Cooperative Council
2.plot: Discover a cooperative alternative for housing students, which also develops them as collaborators and caretakers, in this second episode of Planet Community.

3.title: Enright Ridge Urban Ecovillage
3.plot: What happens when a neighborhood transfers a few forested acres into the commons? Enright Ridge Urban Ecovillage demonstrates an alternative to suburban living, centered around an ecological education center and community supported garden.

imdb.plot outline: What happens when people work together to create solutions to the social, economic, and ecological issues we face today? Planet Community is a series highlighting examples of intentional communities that are living better by living together. Season 1 features communities in the Midwest of the United States. Meet a variety of groups implementing unique solutions, including rural and urban ecovillages, cohousing communities, student housing cooperatives, community land trusts, and more.
imdb.title: Planet Community
plot: What happens when people work together to create solutions to the social, economic, and ecological issues we face today? _Planet Community_ (qv) is a series highlighting examples of intentional communities that are living better by living together. Season 1 features communities in the Midwest of the United States. Meet a variety of groups implementing unique solutions, including rural and urban ecovillages, cohousing communities, student housing cooperatives, community land trusts, and more.::Christopher Kindig
